N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7817.1 - Scope and purpose

State Regulations
(a) The
provisions of this Part shall apply to cogeneration, small hydro and alternate
energy production and facilities which: (1)
are constructed and placed in operation on or after June 26, 1980; (2)
produce electricity, gas or useful
thermal energy for uses other than, or in addition to, onsite residential use
in residential dwellings of four or fewer units; and
(3)
are not subject to the jurisdiction of
the Public Service Commission with respect to the safety of the construction, operation and maintenance of the facility. (b) The purpose of this Part is to establish
safety standards that will further the protection of the public from unsafe
physical contact with such cogeneration, small hydro and alternate energy
production facilities. Notes
